meanings.definition: Displayed or affixed in a public place for public notice or advertisement.
meanings.sent1: The posted sign warned about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: The bulletin board was covered with posted flyers.
meanings.sent3: The posted notice about the lost cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The posted announcement caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The bright red posted sign was impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: Sent or submitted for consideration or approval.
meanings.sent1: She posted her application for the job yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The letter was posted to the editor for review.
meanings.sent3: He posted his crazy idea to see what would happen.
meanings.sent4: The email was posted to the entire team for feedback.
meanings.sent5: They posted their project proposal before the deadline.

meanings.definition: Published or shared on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: The posted photo received many likes on social media.
meanings.sent2: Her blog post was widely shared and commented on.
meanings.sent3: The posted video of the cat dancing went viral.
meanings.sent4: The posted article sparked a heated online discussion.
meanings.sent5: The posted content was engaging and informative.
